Santa_Clara.Roman Catholic Diocese of San Jose in Ca: The Roman Catholic Diocese of San José in California (Latin: Dioecesis Sancti Josephi in California; Spanish: Diócesis de San José en California) is an ecclesiastical territory or diocese of the Roman Catholic Church in the northern California region of the United States. It comprises Santa Clara County, and is led by a bishop. Its patron saints are Saint Joseph and Saint Clare of Assisi.
